Talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Link. The weapons here can draw forth
the true power of this construct.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Link. A Zonai device, when attached to
the construct's back, can greatly enhance
its mobility.
Talk04_1:
However, the construct might be modified
somehow in a way that enables access.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Determination_01>Link. Attaching the proper weapon to
this construct will enable it to attack
distant enemies.
Talk04_2:
<snd:TalkPositive_01>Go, Link. <sp:5:0:0>We are drawing very near now to
the secret stone.
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>Link. <sp:5:0:0>We are close now to the secret
stone. <sp:5:1:0>Draw forth the hidden power in
this construct and press onward.
Talk00_1:
Attach one to a hand and your power in
combat will be magnified severalfold.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>Link. That is the Spirit Temple. But this
construct cannot climb a sheer cliff face.
Talk00_2:
<snd:TalkPositive_01>The road to the secret stone is long and
arduous. I recommend that you make
stops at each armory along the way.<sp:0:4:0>Get accustomed to operating this
construct so that you are prepared for
whatever you may face.
Talk01_1:
We have far to go before we reach the
temple with the secret stone. Speed
would be our ally here.
Talk02_1:
Take careful aim and the tide of battle will
turn in our favor. Go forth and defeat the
monsters which stand in our way.
